metadata.title: CVE-2024-53907 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Potential denial-of-service in django.utils.html.strip_tags()

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-53907` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.26
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.26').
